name: Closeup Red Hot Toothpaste
description: Closeup active gel red hot toothpaste has active zinc mouthwash that gives you up to 12 hours of fresh breath. The micro shine crystals embedded within the formula aids to remove yellow film for whiter teeth. Feel the intense zesty flavours of this red hot gel toothpaste and be forever rewarded with a sparkling white smile and feel refreshed throughout the day. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
